name: A Yoshi's Story 2
overview: OK here it is A YOSHI'S STORY 2! ... this time for realsies ^^ So, for the story. Mouser is back and planning to destroy the island, with an underground bomb and its yoshis job to stop he. Super original story right there : This time there is a map, so no more endless 1 level running around for ever. This hack has custom: music, bosses, GFX, HP bar and lots of there random stuff. Have Fun fixme: music breaks on accurate emulators.
